stone.name: Stone
stone.description: It weighs more than you think, like you could throw it pretty far.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: This is a dagger, it's relatively average and otherwise non interesting.

primrose.name: Primrose
primrose.description: You stay far away from the things like this normally, but you're fine with this set of flowers. They look particularly good right now.

homunculus.name: Homunculus
homunculus.description: Tiny unsightly creature, its eyes dart around quickly.

tonic.name: Bubbling Tonic
tonic.description: You can't stop looking at it, wondering what would happen if you drank all of it. At once.

ashen_mirror.name: Ashen Mirror
ashen_mirror.summary: Can barely make out your reflection.
ashen_mirror.description: Weighs almost nothing, despite being made of wrought iron.

broadsword.name: Broadsword
broadsword.description: Amazing craftsmanship. Despite being heavier than you can carry, it's still something you drag around.
